education.title: BSc Honours, Computer Science
info: Courses: User Interface Design, Web Development, Algorithms, Concurrency

achievements.title: E-Commerce Project
info: Built an online store from scratch in five days with three people. Led overall design of user flows and data. Created wireframes and Javascript functionality.

achievements.title: 3D Game Experiment
info: Studied effectiveness of two types of mini-maps. Learned Unity and C<sup>â™¯</sup> to create game from scratch, even though coding not required.

achievements.title: Personal Website
info: Built website by learning Foundation, Sass, Gulp, and Node for the first time. Website presents accomplishments using custom jQuery gallery and CSS3 animations.

experience.title: Software Developer
info: Built web front-end for over two thousand Manulife fund profiles. Designed and generated interactive SVG graphs that were responsive and accessible.
Planned and led a meeting for project retrospective. Reviewed hurdles and facilitated discussion.

experience.title: Software Developer
info: Independently ported customizations to Netdisco's new version and added new features on the whole stack by designing schema updates for PostgreSQL, visual updates using Bootstrap, and adding backend Perl server-side code.

Gathered feature requirements and ensured satisfaction by proactively meeting with users. Two out of six survey respondents indicated the software met their needs extremely well and four indicated very well.

experience.title: WebSphere Commerce Functional Verification Tester
info: Collaborated with developers and testers to test REST services. Helped in the design of test framework with JUnit 4 and guice expertise.
Created test plan for command line utility using formal software testing techniques.

Performed accessibility testing and discovered fifty accessibility-related defects, including some that were not found during testing of the previous release. Presented tutorial on screen-reader technology to fifty team members, due to recognized expertise.
